name: Threerena
description:
This game is an awesome local multiplayer shooter where you'll have to beat your friends in a best-of-5 to win the game! Each round will change everything in the gameplay. Who will be the best? Show your skill in the Arena of the 3 Rules.

The game was made in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 41 Game Jam, by a team of 3 students. Feel free to leave your feedback.

Hope you like it!
